amendment.description: To enhance the role of the Federal Bureau of Investigation in its intelligence and law enforcement missions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3934 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3934 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Gregg. (consideration: CR S10391, S10394) To enhance the role of the Federal Bureau of Investigation in its intelligence and law enforcement missions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3934 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3934 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Gregg.
